**Yasar Arafath Sharfudeen** is a Ph.D. candidate at Pusan National University, specializing in Environmental and Analytical Chemistry. With over six years of experience in the pharmaceutical industry, he excels in advanced techniques like LC-MS, GC-MS, and data analysis with Python and R. His research focuses on addressing water and soil pollution through innovative solutions.

**Poke around to explore my work and learn more [about me](about.qmd) !**
